Consuming a variety of fortified foods and supplements can also help to meet daily nutrient requirements.
Eating a balanced diet that includes a variety of foods from all food groups can help to ensure adequate intake of essential vitamins and minerals.
Incorporating fermented foods such as kimchi, sauerkraut, and kefir into your diet can help to boost the production of beneficial gut bacteria, which can aid in the absorption of nutrients.
Engaging in regular physical activity can also help to increase the body's ability to absorb and utilize nutrients from food.
Drinking plenty of water and other hydrating beverages can help to maintain optimal bodily function and support the absorption of nutrients.
